alert.note: Alert for Clinch; Echols; Southern Ware (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 7:04PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Echols, southeastern Ware and southeastern Clinch Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 703 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Needmore, or 12 miles west of Fargo, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph, half inch hail, and excessive cloud-to-ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Excessive cloud-to-ground lightning is occurring. Locations impacted include... Fargo and Needmore. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for northern Florida...and southeastern Georgia. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for northern and northeastern Florida...and southeastern Georgia.
